comment: Waste of time. App won't scan most of the time. Can't enter bakery owns. It won't accept loyalty cards. This is a complete waste of time, total garbage, a massive fail.

author: Erin Kolowich
comment: Hasn't worked properly in months. There's always a 'technical difficulty ' when trying to download coupons. I had uninstalled and reinstalled to attempt to fix the preoblem...didn't help.

author: Janelle Gilmore
comment: App sucks. Website sucks.

author: Tyler Hill
comment: Great now that it has changed to the app

author: Michelle Cooper
comment: (Update) - app is still very glitchy-this morning I couldn't check out from the app but it wasn't telling me why, I logged on to the computer and it told me it couldn't calculate the pick up fee, it took 3 tries. You should also be allowed to make changes to your order within the first hour of it being placed. I wanted to remove some items I didn't need about 15 minutes after placing my order and was told it was too late, this is inconvenient since it was 7a.m. and I'm not picking my order up until 7 tonight.    >>>So very slow, it doesn't matter if I use data or wifi. Please fix it. I have to do the click list on the computer because the app is so painfully slow. Unresponsive all morning. I give up. Every time I try to search for an item it takes so long to load, and then I receive an "unresponsive script" *notice. Nothing else on my phone is having this problem, this is my first time using the app for grocery(pick up) service and I can't even complete the list.

author: Trevor Morgan
comment: Constant bugs. Almost always has problems when trying to load coupons. Struggles to load images every time I swipe the screen. Click list charges you and it doesn't deliver. Worthless app.

author: Paper Bag
comment: Doesn't work when needed, I held up an entire line as deal after deal wouldn't display when clicked. My internet was at full bars.

author: Mac Buck
comment: We are playing at like in a request from my account to pay you for the interview on the doorbell is available for you to come over to watch my kids are all set to start today and miss you too babe and thank you again soon love it if we could meet up with me being delivered today and I will be there in about your trip to see you in person please let us know if you want to come by the house to myself and my husband is available for the rest of our lives together for a few things happen to be a part of this group is available to help me out with a bang on the door to be a little bit of time with my order to hear from you soon love you 😍 let's do this now and then some pics of you guys for coming to the house to get a hold on my account to pay for the next few questions regarding the same place to live on the east side of town are you still looking for a job change in plans for the weekend so we will be there in about your trip when we meet up at the latest and greatest gift for you and your family and friends are coming to visit the site is not working properly so sorry for being late notice but I'm sure we can work something out for dinner tonight and prayers are with You Let's Do This Now And You Xoxoxo Love You 😍 Set it when we get back from lunch to go through this now and then some rest of our lives together with you and your team have been trying for the next couple of the guys from my vacation time to shine on the way home and get me some pics of my life with my order number is available to help out with the new one is going well for all your help and support their cases of water in the basement of our house is a wonderful idea and the only way to get a hold of the guy who did it again and I look forward for your response and then we are still in person and catch you up at some point to get the ball rolling on this now and I don't know how many times I love you 😍.
Love it

author: Jennifer montague
comment: I use to LOVE this app..... however it is a ghost of what it once was saddly.  with time you would think the app would get better not worse. SLOW is an understatement, FREEZES, KICKS YOU OUT, GLITCHY, NON RESPONSIVE, ALWAYS TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES  well this list can go on n on you get my point. PLEASE fix it or go back to the way it once was you know that time when it WORKED!! then i will change my star ratings.

author: Rebecca Jensen
comment: This app doesn't work. The coupons won't load to the card so it's unusable.

author: Jesharelah Pena
comment: Great app. You have to link it to your card for the coupons to load. I have never had any problems using it.

author: ByJanice Fitzgerald
comment: This app has too many bugs. It removed all of my free Friday coupons and now I can't do anything including checking my prescriptions because of technical difficulties. Which happens all the time. FIX IT

author: Randi Taber
comment: New app is not user friendly. Can't add my rewards card. Adding items to your list takes forever. Not a fan of the change.

author: Deana Rupe
comment: Worth getting. I get alot of discounts and free items after I get so many points on my card.

author: Cynthia Vatcher
comment: It sucks there's always an issue logging in.

author: Jessi Martinez
comment: Won't let me download any coupons
No way to contact you.

author: Raymond Lopez
comment: Great

author: Douglas W
comment: The latest update of this app really ruined the functionality. The search function doesn't pull up basic things like "waffles". I'm not sure why I need to re-enter my information when there used to be a sign-up function. When I tried to check out the app removed several items from my cart because I "changed my pickup location" which (a) I had not done because I use the same store every time and (b) all the items I selected were items I know the store has. I've abandoned ClickList until this gets fixed.

author: Tom Brenner
comment: Your app sucks

author: Jon Baird
comment: It's a good app for everyday shopping, but if there is ever any great deals (25 days of Christmas, Free Friday, etc) unless you go on the first day, the store WILL be out. You'd think they would order more if they were going to run these... but nope. Just left the store VERY disappointed,  yet again.

author: Denise Depierre
comment: My free Friday stopped working rep weeks ago and I did not get a good item. This isn't the first time this has happened to me. Not happy. Otherwise, the app is pretty useful in saving $$.

author: Elaine Lewis
comment: Poorly developed app.  List coffee creamer as being in the bakery and frozen vegetables are in produce.   Doesn't show sale price or deal details.  Only good for free Friday download.  Very disappointing.

author: Katy Owens
comment: The only reason I downloaded this app is so I can download the "free friday" coupon.  It worked great up until a couple of weeks ago. Something must have changed because the app won't even pull up the free friday download.  It advertises it, but when I click on the advertisement or try to search for the item, it says it doesn't exist. It's done this the past two Fridays. SUPER FRUSTRATING!!

author: Wonder Midget
comment: Made my entire day!!!  I was so excited to find out about this app.  I have been telling everyone.about it.  The very best thing about this pp is you can create shopping lists and it tells you where it is located within the store you shop at!!!  This is the most ingenious thing ever!!!!!  And it tells you a subtotal of everything you are getting!  I am so excited to use this app!

author: Justin Gort
comment: It has grown incredibly slow and glitchy. It constantly times out. It is very frustrating, and has gone from difficult to impossible to use.

author: Alicia Charles
comment: Free Friday download isn't working anymore. It shows up on home screen, but isn't there when you tap it. It was the best thing about this app 🙁

author: Penne Wylie
comment: I like the app. However I am having problems with my Kroger card. It is a Fry's VIP card from Tucson AZ. I want to transfer my prescriptions to Smith's.

author: Lucas De
comment: Sync your shopping list with your coupon list in this app. Please! Items entered into my shopping list should be able to check the coupon list for matching coupons.         ·Steps I Do Now· [1] I compare items/prices & make a shopping list in the "my list" search engine. [2] Search already searched items one at a time in "my coupons" a separate search engine if there's a coupon. [3] Then load each one to my Smith's rewards card.

author: Ann Nieves
comment: I am not getting my free downloads on Friday ever since the update please fix

author: Brock Schacht
comment: The free friday download is not showing up in the app. Please fix it.

author: MomofboysBYU
comment: I can't get free Fridays anymore or the 25 days of giving..
This is my first time  using the  apps.

author: Megan Cammack
comment: I love this store and app
Works great!

author: Cresta Slaugh
comment: Try to make my list.  I tell the app to search for my item to make my shopping list and the app tells me that the item can't be found.  Which in fact, I know Smith's has the product I am searching for .

author: DJ Rivera
comment: Can't create an account every time I enter a password it just says invalid no matter what password I use. All it says is invalid we'll this app is invalid!

author: Michael Patane
comment: Takes way too long to browse through all the digital coupons, then you have to save them in order to use them. Big waste of time
Hassle to use...too many times I have to Uninstall then add back in for no reason.
